name: Puzzlescape!
description:
Puzzlescape - The best game for word puzzle lovers.

Completely FREE collection of the most addictive and popular word games, Puzzlescape will give you a brand new fun puzzle experience.

Enjoy all of your favorite word games in ONE place: word connect, word block, crossword, hangman and more, which are all easy to learn and challenge to master, good to train your brain and unleash your vocabulary.

Play on the run, in the air, or just killing time. The intuitive and easy-to-use interface makes solving your favorite word puzzles easier than ever before!

Game Features:

- 7 best word games and more will be coming
- 10000+ well-designed puzzles with different difficulty levels
- 110+ puzzle medals to collect
- Simple, easy, and addictive gameplay
- Solve puzzles easier and faster with hints
- intuitive and easy-to-use game interface
- Ask your family and friend for help on Facebook
- No time limit
- Play Anywhere, no-wifi needed

Download and play the Puzzlescape now for FREE, enjoy the game with millions of the word puzzle enthusiasts!
